G

GameController - Class in controller
Manages the logic and state transitions of a game, including moving the ball, detecting collisions, and keeping score.
GameController() - Constructor for class controller.GameController
 
GameControllerTest - Class in controller
Tests for the GameController class that cover collision detection and response handling.
GameControllerTest() - Constructor for class controller.GameControllerTest
 
GameState - Class in model
Represents the state of the game, including the dimensions of the play area, the players, the ball, and the winning score necessary to end the game.
GameState() - Constructor for class model.GameState
Constructs a new GameState with default dimensions, players, and ball.
GameView - Class in view
Renders the visual representation of the game state on a canvas.
GameView(double, double) - Constructor for class view.GameView
Constructs a GameView with specified height and width.
getBall() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the ball used in the game.
getBounces() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the number of bounces the ball has made.
getConfirm() - Method in class view.MenuView
Retrieves the property indicating whether game settings have been confirmed.
getGame() - Method in class controller.GameController
Retrieves the current game state.
getHeight() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the height of the game area.
getInitialSpeed() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the initial speed of the ball.
getLayout() - Method in class view.MenuView
Gets the layout of the menu, containing all UI components.
getPaddle() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the paddle associated with the player.
getPlayer1() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the first player in the game.
getPlayer2() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the second player in the game.
getPlayerName() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the name of the player.
getRandom() - Method in class model.Ball
Provides access to the random number generator used for initial speed and direction.
getRunning() - Method in class controller.BallManager
Returns the current running state of the ball movement.
getScore() - Method in class model.Player
Returns the current score of the player.
getSpeedIncreaseFrequency() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the frequency at which the ball's speed is increased after a certain number of bounces.
getSpeedIncreaseScale() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the scale factor by which the ball's speed is increased after a certain number of bounces.
getWidth() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the width of the game area.
getWinningScore() - Method in class model.GameState
Gets the winning score for the game.
getXSpeed() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the current speed of the ball along the X axis.
getYSpeed() - Method in class model.Ball
Returns the current speed of the ball along the Y axis.
